text:
NAEB Headquarters
lU Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
November 23, 1955
TO: NAEB Board
Engineering Committee
Professional Advancement. Committee
Mr. Go Ho Griffiths ~ FAE
Mro Wo Mo Lowry - Ford Foundation
Mr So Ann Spinney «* FAE
Dr. Ronald Shilen « FAE
FROM: Ho J0 Skomia
SUBJECT: 1955 NAEB TV Engineering Workshop Comments
For your information, here are the unedited comments of those who
participated in the 1955 NAEB TV Engineering Workshop held at WKAR-TV
at East Lansing, Michigan, September 12-16, 1955*. A complete report of
the Workshop is now being prepared by Mr. Bidlaek, who coordinated the
Workshop, with committee support* You will be supplied with copies of
this when available*
CSB:HJS;cr
